Legislative History of Laws

For Law 13-175, see notes following ยง 31-3001.

DC CODE ยง 31-3004

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: The requirements of this chapter shall apply to all health benefit plans issued, delivered, renewed, or reissued on the 91st day after October 21, 2000.

All health benefit plans other than the health benefit plans specified in subsection (a) of this section shall comply with the requirements of this chapter within 180 days after the date specified in subsection (a) of this section.
